description:
With three law offices across Cuyahoga County, including our location in Chesterland, Ohio, Crandall & Pera Law, LLC, provides convenient access to the unmatched advocacy and support you need at this time when you need it the most. Regarded as one of our region's premier personal injury and medical malpractice law firms, we have achieved unprecedented success helping our plaintiff clients recover the full amount of compensation they deserve for the injuries and losses they suffered as the result of any of the following:

  • Medical malpractice
  • Surgical and hospital errors
  • Brain and spinal cord injuries
  • Birth and delivery injuries
  • Vaccine injuries
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Construction accidents
  • Other personal injury and wrongful death claims

We have on our staff a team of some of the best trial lawyers in the country, and our attorneys have earned AV Preeminent peer review ratings* from Martindale-Hubbell and consistent recognition from The Best Lawyers in America, including the organization's Lawyer of the Year Award. Moreover, we are also lifetime members of the Million Dollar and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forums as the result of our having recovered tens of millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients.

Along with the accolades from our peers, we have also received Superb client ratings on Avvo as well as the 10 Best in Client Satisfaction Award from the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys. Furthermore, and possibly the most important of all, we have received countless testimonials and referrals from those we have served, and we are proud to be able to help so many in our community during their most dire times of need.

To receive a free evaluation of your claim, you can contact Crandall & Pera Law, LLC, by calling our law office or visiting our website to schedule an appointment. We also offer virtual consultations through phone or video conference to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
